jobDescription: RoleThis candidate will contribute to the future success of the company by executing the processes necessary for the manufacturing and performance of on time, on quality, CNC tool and cutter grinders to our customers.ResponsibilitiesElectrical assembly and sub-assembly of precision CNC tool and cutter grinders, under the direction of a Production Supervisor.Communicate clearly progress on builds and be able to work effectively in cross-functional teams.Work with engineering when necessary, to capture design changes in documentation.Knowledge and SkillsCandidate will have strong electrical experience and ability to read technical machine tool schematics and wiring diagrams.Mechanical assembly experience and machine tool experience is a plus.An established tool set is helpful, but not required.Reliable work ethic that fits into the Company’s mission and goals.Education RequirementsHigh School diploma or GED up to a licensed electrician.Experience Requirements3 years’ experience in a manufacturing environment preferred.
